title: Mike Huckabee Immigration Policy In 6 Quotes
text:

Well, they did pick on the Clintons because they had a pet cat, instead of a dog like the Bushes. posted on Fox Commentator: Jews Let The Nazis Exterminate Them pollypolitic • 3 min ago 
His problem is that he has nasty temper. He won't be able to maintain his "nice guy" act for long. posted on Kasich Tells Social Security Recipients To 'Get Over' Potential Cuts In Benefits fortunev • 3 min ago 
Bernie Sanders is the person the country needs to help extinguish the hate and negativism and racism that radiates from the Grifters On Parade (GOP), assisted by right-wing ideologues and right-wing media. By minimizing the grifters' influence via a massive national turnout for Senator Sanders the mass media will have no choice but to accede to the public's will or collapse in a mass hypocrisy never to be granted legitimacy again. For they have never taken Bernie seriously. Eat crow, suckers! posted on Bernie Sanders Draws 13,000 To Tucson Rally Alien_Overlord • 3 min ago 
There is the "Peaceful Respecful Freedom"/"Freedom to Peacefully Exist(without the danger of having recidivists waiting for you around the corner)" and there is the "I'll do whatever I want Freedom"/"(Anarchy)Freedom to do whatever you please without any disregard for those around you" ... Unfortunately the English language have only one word for those two entirely different meanings. posted on Colbert Makes A Mockery Of Chaos Being Caused By House 'Freedom Caucus' Latest from CLTV
